divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were in our backyard looking at stars toward the ne. when this object came out of nowhere by a star, it was a very bright blue\white glow. i thought at first that it was a satellite, but this was large and traveled slow compared to satellites that i have seen before that were small and fast. there was no blinking lights like a plane would have. this bright glow traveled ne until we could not see it anymore. my wife and i were surprised at what we just seen. i hope others seen this too, would like to know what it was.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around June 2nd 2013
Summary: Was looking at stars when this came out of nowhere and moved slow
